content.description:
If this was a freestanding boulder and not a hang & drop it would get so many stars.

 Start deep under the low roof on two half-pad crimps. Toss to the deep slot, the make an enormous move left to the deep slot mouth at the lip. Charge left again to a distant edge and compress another edge to the thin crimp above the blankness. 

 Get to the better flat ledge and then gain the high, obvious jug point high and right to drop.

Just off of the trail to the left (from the trail you can throw your crashpad and hit it). This low roof is less aesthetic than most of the proud freestanding boulders around but is as trailside as it gets, it has good quality rock, and fun but savage climbing. Here you can find "Power to the People" (V8).
